channel.title: Text-to-Speech on News @ machinelearning.sg
channel.description: Recent content in Text-to-Speech on News @ machinelearning.sg

item.title: Text to Speech with Tacotron2 and WaveGlow
item.description: tl;dr A step-by-step tutorial to generate spoken audio from text automatically using a pipeline of Nvidia’s Tacotron2 and WaveGlow models and applying speech enhancement. Practical Machine Learning - Learn Step-by-Step to Train a Model A great way to learn is by going step-by-step through the process of training and evaluating the model. Hit the Open in Colab button below to launch a Jupyter Notebook in the cloud with a step-by-step walkthrough.

item.title: Text to Speech with Silero
item.description: tl;dr A step-by-step tutorial to generate spoken audio from text automatically using the enterprise-grade SileroTTS model and applying speech enhancement. Practical Machine Learning - Learn Step-by-Step to Train a Model A great way to learn is by going step-by-step through the process of training and evaluating the model. Hit the Open in Colab button below to launch a Jupyter Notebook in the cloud with a step-by-step walkthrough.
